description: Try our easy to follow Huevos Rancheros recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tortilla,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Father's Day,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Quick & easy lunch,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Huevos Rancheros Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g can red kidney beans, drained, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add vegetables. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add kidney beans, tomato and chilli powder to pan. Stir until well combined. Bring mixture to the boil. Simmer for 8 minutes or until mixture has thickened slightly.
Heat 2 tsp oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Break 2 eggs into the pan and cook for 3 minutes or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate. Add remaining oil and cook remaining eggs.

Heat tortillas following packet instructions, then divide among warm serving bowls. Spoon over the kidney bean mixture and top each with an egg. Scatter over coriander leaves, season with pepper and serve.
